name: vralle-lazyload
description: Lazy loading images to speed up loading pages and reduce the load on the server. Images are loaded when they get to the screen. Uses lazysizes.js
author: vralle

scripts.vendor: shx cp node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.js vendor/lazysizes/  && shx cp node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.min.js vendor/lazysizes && shx cp -R node_modules/lazysizes/plugins/ vendor/lazysizes/plugins/
